title: Low  priority Que, / ban will not change my leaving games / afking matches ect.
body:
I just make me even more mad, so i use many accounts, if i dont get an aram champ i like, I leave. If someone is trolling in a ranked we will lose the game. Tons of players like me do this and its really making the game very bad.

You wont change us you cant stop us, just change the game, change the bans/ ques. Stop forcing us into your daily champion pools that we dont want to play or anyone for that matter. 

The snow ball grows and lol just keeps diving down. 

I just play other games while in que, and leave on propose if there is something I dont like. 

You guys have a good day !
